biotools.summary:
A Novel Method for Classification and Feature Selection. An Application in Metabolomics Studies.

Here we provide a python code for the "Primal-Dual for Classification with Rejection (PD-CR)" method.\ This method works on Spyder 3.3.6.\ Users will need to have some experience in coding to use the scripts.\ The code is currently usable with ".csv" files following a specific organization (see Test datasets for an example). Users may need to modify the scripts to use PD-CR on new files.

bioschemas.name: PD-CR
